about_the_game:
A pair of fun glasses commemorating the 25th anniversary of the Atelier series.
These can be worn by any of the 11 members of the player party.

Note: This accessory can only be applied to characters who have joined your party.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 or over, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 or over, AMD Radeon RX550 or over, 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: ※If you are using Windows® 11, the system requirements for Windows® 11 apply.
